metadata.title: AI SEO Product Description Generator | Batch Shots
metadata.description: Generate complete, SEO-optimized product descriptions (title, meta title/description, short/long description, categories, tags, URL slug) from basic info.
metadata.keywords: seo product description, ai product description, ecommerce seo, product description generator, meta description generator, product title generator

info.title: WHAT IS THIS TOOL?
info.description: This AI-powered tool generates a complete SEO package for your products from basic information. You'll receive a product title, meta title, meta description, short and long descriptions, categories, tags, and a URL slug, all optimized for search engines.

freeMode.title: FREE MODE
freeMode.description: Generate up to 5 SEO product descriptions per day. Upgrade to PRO for unlimited generation and access to all SEO content fields.

proMode.title: PRO MODE
proMode.description: Unlimited access to generate complete SEO product descriptions with all premium features unlocked.

benefits.completeDesc: Get a full set of SEO content for your product, ready to use.
benefits.aiPoweredDesc: Generates unique, compelling, and keyword-rich descriptions.
benefits.bestPracticesDesc: Follows guidelines for character counts, keyword placement, and readability.
benefits.quickEasyDesc: Save hours by generating professional descriptions in seconds.

upgradeCard.title: UPGRADE TO PRO
upgradeCard.description: Unlock unlimited SEO product description generation and access all features.

instructionsCard.title: HOW TO USE
instructionsCard.step1: Enter basic details about your product (name, features, materials, etc.).
instructionsCard.step3: Review the generated content (title, meta, descriptions, etc.).
instructionsCard.step4: Copy the content or download it as a text file.
instructionsCard.step5: Use the generated SEO content on your e-commerce store or website.

**One-time payment, lifetime access**

oneTime.question: Is this really a one-time payment?
oneTime.answer: Yes! Pay once and get lifetime access to all PRO features. No recurring subscriptions.

backgroundRemoval.question: How does background removal work?
backgroundRemoval.answer: We use advanced AI algorithms to detect and remove backgrounds from your product images. The entire process happens in your browser - we never store your images on our servers.

imageLimits.question: What are the image limits?
imageLimits.answer: Free users can process up to 10 images at once with basic features and remove the background from 1 image at a time. PRO users can process up to 100 images simultaneously, including bulk background removal.

refund.question: Can I request a refund?
refund.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the PRO features. Contact our support team for assistance.

PrivacyPolicy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
PrivacyPolicy.section1P1: Welcome to Batch Shots (“we”, “our”, “us”). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information.
PrivacyPolicy.section1P2: This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your data when you use our browser-based image optimization tool.
PrivacyPolicy.section2P1Bold: We do not collect or store your images.
PrivacyPolicy.section2P1: Our core principle is privacy by design.
PrivacyPolicy.section2P2: Batch Shots operates entirely within your browser. When you upload images to optimize:
PrivacyPolicy.section2Li1: Your images are processed locally in your browser using client-side JavaScript.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Li2: Your images never leave your device and are not transmitted to our servers.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Li3: We do not store copies of your original or processed images.
PrivacyPolicy.section2Li4: We do not track the content of your images.
PrivacyPolicy.section3P1: When you use our AI-powered SEO name generation features:
PrivacyPolicy.section3Li1: We send only the descriptive text you provide to our API.
PrivacyPolicy.section3Li2: We do not send or process your actual images through our AI systems.
PrivacyPolicy.section3Li3: Your generated SEO names are delivered back to your browser and are not permanently stored on our servers.
PrivacyPolicy.section4P1: We use minimal analytics to understand how our site is used:
PrivacyPolicy.section4Li1: We collect anonymous usage statistics like page views and feature usage.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Li2: We use essential cookies to provide functionality like reCAPTCHA protection.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Li3: We do not use cookies for advertising or tracking across other websites.
PrivacyPolicy.section5P1: We use the following third-party services:
PrivacyPolicy.section5Li1: Google reCAPTCHA for spam protection on our AI features.
PrivacyPolicy.section5Li2: OpenCV.js for image processing (runs entirely in your browser).
PrivacyPolicy.section5P2: Each of these services has its own privacy policy governing how they handle data.
PrivacyPolicy.section6P1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
PrivacyPolicy.section7P1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@batchshots.com.

TermsOfUse.title: TERMS OF USE
TermsOfUse.section1P1: By accessing and using Batch Shots, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you may not use our service.
TermsOfUse.section2P1: Batch Shots is a browser-based image optimization tool that allows users to:
TermsOfUse.section2Li1: Adjust image properties such as brightness, contrast, and white balance
TermsOfUse.section2Li2: Resize and optimize images for web use
TermsOfUse.section2P2: All image processing occurs locally in your browser; no images are uploaded to or stored on our servers.
TermsOfUse.section3P1: Users of Batch Shots are solely responsible for ensuring they have the necessary rights and permissions to use, upload, and process any images with our service. Batch Shots is not responsible for any copyright or intellectual property violations arising from your use of the service. You must use the service in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.
TermsOfUse.section3Li1: Ensuring they have the necessary rights and permissions to modify and process the images they use
TermsOfUse.section3Li2: Using the service in compliance with applicable laws and regulations
TermsOfUse.section3Li3: Not using the service to process, create, or distribute inappropriate, offensive, or illegal content
TermsOfUse.section3Li4: Not attempting to reverse engineer, modify, or hack the service
TermsOfUse.section4P1: All original content, features, and functionality of Batch Shots are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
TermsOfUse.section4P2: You retain all rights to your original images. We claim no ownership over the images you process using our service.
TermsOfUse.section4aTitle: 4A. User Content, Ownership, and Lifetime Pro Access
TermsOfUse.section4aP1: All images and content uploaded or processed using Batch Shots remain the sole property of the user. Batch Shots does not store, view, or transmit your images to our servers; all processing occurs locally in your browser. You are solely responsible for ensuring you have the necessary rights and permissions to use and process any images with our service. Batch Shots is not responsible for any copyright or intellectual property violations arising from your use of the service.
TermsOfUse.section4aP2: "Lifetime" access to Pro features means you will have access to all Pro features for as long as Batch Shots is operated and maintained as a service. If Batch Shots is discontinued, we will make reasonable efforts to provide Pro users with access to the software code or to open source the application, enabling continued use.
TermsOfUse.section5Li1: Batch Shots is provided “as is” and “as available” without any warranties of any kind.
TermsOfUse.section5Li2: We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
TermsOfUse.section5Li3: We are not responsible for any loss of data that may occur during processing. Users are responsible for keeping their own backups.
TermsOfUse.section5Li4: We make no warranties regarding the accuracy or effectiveness of the SEO name generation feature.
TermsOfUse.section5Li5: Batch Shots is not responsible for any legal claims, damages, or disputes arising from user content or the use of the service.
TermsOfUse.section6P1: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the service, or from any legal claims arising from your content.
TermsOfUse.section7P1: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of Batch Shots at any time without prior notice or liability.
TermsOfUse.section8P1: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which we operate, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
TermsOfUse.section9P1: We may update these Terms of Use from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the “Last Updated” date.
TermsOfUse.section10P1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us at terms@batchshots.com.

metadata.title: AI Object Removal Tool | Batch Shots
metadata.description: Remove unwanted objects, people, or text from your images with our AI-powered tool. Works entirely in your browser for privacy. Try it for free!
metadata.keywords: object removal, ai object removal, remove objects from image, remove text from image, remove people from photo, inpainting, image editing tool

info.title: HOW IT WORKS
info.description: Remove unwanted objects, people, or text from your images using AI. The processing happens entirely in your browser.

freeMode.title: FREE MODE
freeMode.description: Process 1 image at a time. Upgrade to PRO for batch processing (coming soon!).

proMode.title: PRO MODE
proMode.description: Process up to 100 images in batch mode. Draw a mask once and apply it to all your images!

upload.title: Upload Your Image
upload.helpTextFree: Select the image you want to edit.
upload.helpTextPro: Select up to 100 images for batch processing.

upgradeCard.title: UPGRADE TO PRO
upgradeCard.description: Unlock batch object removal for up to 100 images and other PRO features like bulk background removal and advanced editing.

instructionsCard.title: INSTRUCTIONS
instructionsCard.step1: Upload your image using the 'Select Image' button.
instructionsCard.step2: Carefully paint over the object(s) you want to remove using the red brush.
instructionsCard.step3: Adjust the Brush Size slider for precision.
instructionsCard.step4: Click the 'Remove Objects' button and wait for the AI to process.
instructionsCard.step5: Once processed, download your clean image using the 'Download' button.
instructionsCard.step6: For batch processing, check 'Apply mask to all images' to remove similar objects from all selected images.
instructionsCard.noteText: Processing can take 15-60 seconds depending on image size and your device. Ensure your mask fully covers the object for best results.

imageGallery.applyMaskToAll: Apply mask to all images (batch processing)

errors.ortLoad: Failed to load AI Engine. Please try refreshing the page.
errors.sessionCreate: Failed to initialize the object removal model.
errors.freeLimit: Free users can only process 1 image at a time. Please upgrade to PRO for batch processing.
errors.tooManyImages: Maximum 100 images allowed. Only the first 100 images will be processed.
errors.noMask: Please draw a mask over the object you want to remove first.
errors.resultLoadFailed: Failed to display the processed image result.
errors.noDownloadData: No processed image available to download.
errors.downloadFailed: Failed to prepare image for download.

metadata.title: AI Duplicate Photo Finder & Cleaner | Batch Shots
metadata.description: Quickly find and remove duplicate or similar photos with our AI-powered tool. Identifies best quality images in duplicate sets. Free & in-browser.
metadata.keywords: duplicate photo finder, remove duplicate images, similar photo finder, ai photo cleaner, image duplicate detection, best quality photo, declutter photos, batchshots

ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.AIReady: AI Ready. Select photos to find duplicates.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.AIReadyPrompt: AI Ready. Select photos to find duplicates.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.AIEngineErrorRefresh: AI Engine Error: {data}. Please refresh or try again.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.AICriticalErrorRefresh: A critical error occurred with our AI analysis. Please refresh the page.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.QualityToolsError: Quality analysis tools failed to load. Detailed quality metrics may be unavailable.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.NoImagesProcessedSuccessfully: No photos could be processed successfully. Processed {successfullyProcessedCount} of {totalImagesCount} photos.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.NoImagesForNewThreshold: No photos to analyze with the new similarity setting.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.AINotReadyError: AI analysis engine is not ready. Please wait or refresh.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.HEICConversionFailedSkip: Failed to convert image: {fileName}. It will be skipped.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.HEICConversionErrorSkip: Error converting image: {fileName}. It will be skipped.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.NoValidFilesAfterConversion: No valid files to process after conversion attempts.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.NoValidImagesSelected: No valid photos selected to process.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.QualityToolsNotReadyKPI: Quality analysis tools not ready. Cannot calculate detailed quality.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.QualityToolsNotReadyQuality: Quality analysis tools not ready. Cannot calculate quality.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.QualityToolsNotReadyAnalysisWait: Quality analysis tools are not ready. Please wait.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.NoDuplicatesInGroup: No duplicates in this group to analyze.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.AnalyzingGroupQuality: Analyzing quality for photos in group {groupNumber}...
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.QualityAnalysisPartialForGroup: Quality analysis partially done for group {groupNumber}. Some photos might have failed or were skipped.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.QualityToolsNotReadyBestSelection: Quality analysis tools not ready. Cannot ensure best photo selection.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.AnalyzingQualityForBestDownload: Analyzing quality for {count} photo(s) to select the best for download...
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.PreDownloadAnalysisComplete: Pre-download quality analysis complete for the current group.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.QualityToolsNotReadyDownloadAll: Quality analysis tools are not ready. Detailed analysis for duplicate sets cannot be performed for 'Download All'. Please wait or analyze groups individually first.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.BestImageDeterminationFailed: Could not determine the best photo for a group. This group will be omitted from the ZIP.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.WarningBestImageOmitted: Warning: The best photo for a group could not be determined and was omitted.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.ErrorCreatingZIP: Error creating ZIP file for download.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.NoImagesSelectedForDownload: No photos were selected for download (e.g., no unique photos or no best photos identified in groups).
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.ImageDataMissingDownload: Photo data is missing, cannot download.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.QualityToolsNotReadyAnalyzeAllGroups: Quality analysis tools are not ready. Detailed analysis for duplicate sets cannot be performed. Please wait.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.OnlyUniqueImagesReadyDownload: Only unique photos present. Ready to download.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.NoImagesToAnalyzeOrDownload: No photos to analyze or download.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.AnalyzingAllGroupsForBest: Analyzing all groups for best photo selection...
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.AnalyzingGroupForBest: Analyzing group {currentGroup} of {totalGroups} for best photo...
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.AllGroupsAnalyzedReadyDownload: All {count} duplicate groups analyzed. Ready to download {downloadCount} best photos.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.AnalysisPartialReadyDownload: Analysis for best selection partially complete ({processedGroups}/{totalGroups} groups). Ready to download {downloadCount} photos (best available will be chosen).
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.NoImagesProcessedOrGroups: No photos processed or no groups formed yet. Ensure photos were selected and AI analysis completed.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.LoaderDescriptionInitializing: Getting things ready for smart duplicate detection. Please wait.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.LoaderDescriptionLoadingModel: Our advanced AI is warming up. This might take a moment.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.LoaderDescriptionQualityTools: Preparing tools for detailed photo quality insights...
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.LoaderProDescription: Verifying your account status to enable all available features...
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.UploadSectionDescription: Select multiple photos. Our AI will intelligently analyze them and group similar ones together.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.SupportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP, HEIC formats
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.SimilarityThresholdDescription: Control how closely photos must match to be flagged as duplicates. Higher values mean stricter matching.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.UniqueImagesTitle: Unique Photos ({count} photo(s) with no direct duplicates)
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.ButtonAnalyzeAllGroups: Analyze All Groups for Best Selection
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.HowItWorksStep1Desc: Click "Select Photos" and choose the images you want to check. You can select many at once.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.HowItWorksStep2Desc: Our advanced AI (based on Vision Transformer technology) intelligently analyzes the visual content of each photo, understanding its unique features and appearance.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.HowItWorksStep3Desc: The AI compares photos using sophisticated visual analysis (cosine similarity) to determine how alike they are based on their content.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.HowItWorksStep4Desc: Use the similarity slider to control how strict the matching is. A higher value means photos must be almost identical to be flagged as duplicates.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.HowItWorksStep5Desc: Results clearly show duplicate sets and unique photos. Our AI can also highlight the best quality photo in each duplicate group, helping you decide which to keep.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.FreeUserLimit: Free users can upload up to {limit} photos at a time.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.UpgradeMessage: Upgrade to PRO to analyze unlimited photos at once.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.HowItWorksStep1Free: Free users are limited to {limit} photos at a time.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.HowItWorksStep1Pro: As a PRO user, you can analyze unlimited photos at once.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.FreeModeDescription: Process up to {limit} photos at a time. Upgrade to PRO to analyze unlimited photos!
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.ProModeDescription: Process unlimited photos with your PRO account!
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.MaxImagesExceeded: Maximum 100 images allowed. Only the first 100 were processed.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.UpgradeCardFeature1: Analyze unlimited photos at once (vs. 5 in free mode)
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.UpgradeCardFeature2: Find duplicates in large photo collections quickly
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.UpgradeCardFeature3: Quality analysis to find the best photos automatically
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.UpgradeCardFeature4: Batch download of best photos from duplicate sets
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.UpgradeCardFeature5: Access to all other PRO features (background removal, etc.)
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.ProUpgradeTitle: Upgrade to Pro for Unlimited Photos
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.SimilarityThresholdDescDistance: Lower values mean more similar images (distance metric)
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.SimilarityThresholdDescSimilarity: Higher values mean more similar images (similarity metric)
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.VisualizationDescription: Visualize how AI sees your images in high-dimensional space, reduced to 2D using UMAP algorithm. Similar images cluster together.
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.VisualizationNoData: Upload and process images first to enable visualization
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.VisualizationProcessingStatus: This may take a moment for large datasets...
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.VisualizationHelpText: Hover over points to see image thumbnails • Closer points = more similar images
ImageDuplicateDetectionPage.VisualizationNeedMinImages: Need at least 3 images for visualization

metadata.title: AI Image SEO Generation - Generate SEO URL Slugs & Captions
metadata.description: Upload your images to automatically generate SEO-friendly names, URL slugs, and captions using AI.
metadata.keywords: image seo, url slug generator, image seo caption generator, ai content creation, image optimization

ImageSeoGenerationPage.AISetup: Setting Up AI for SEO Content...
ImageSeoGenerationPage.AIReadyPrompt: Ready for AI SEO. Please upload your images.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.ErrorProcessingImage: Error in AI SEO Processing for image {imageId}: {data}
ImageSeoGenerationPage.AIEngineErrorRefresh: AI SEO Engine Error: {data}. Please refresh.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.AICriticalErrorRefresh: Critical AI SEO Engine Error. Please refresh and try again.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.PleaseSelectImages: Please select images for AI SEO generation.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.AINotReadyError: AI SEO Engine not ready. Please wait.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.ProcessingFilesHEIC: Processing images for AI SEO, converting HEIC if needed...
ImageSeoGenerationPage.HEICConversionFailedSkip: HEIC to SEO-friendly format conversion failed for: {fileName}. Skipping.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.HEICConversionErrorSkip: Error converting HEIC for SEO: {fileName}. Skipping.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.NoValidFilesAfterConversion: No valid images for AI SEO after conversion attempts.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.NoValidFiles: No valid images selected for AI SEO processing.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.SendingImagesToAI: Sending {count} images to AI for SEO content generation...
ImageSeoGenerationPage.AllImagesProcessed: AI SEO processing complete. View your optimized content below.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.PageTitle: AI Image SEO & Alt Text Generator
ImageSeoGenerationPage.PageTitlePro: PRO AI Image SEO & Alt Text Generator
ImageSeoGenerationPage.MainCardTitle: Generate SEO Names & Captions with AI
ImageSeoGenerationPage.UploadSectionDescription: Upload JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, HEIC images. Our AI generates SEO-friendly filenames and alt text. Add keywords to refine results.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.UploadSectionDescriptionWithLimit: Upload JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, HEIC (max {maxImages} for your plan). AI generates SEO filenames & alt text. Add keywords for custom results.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.ImageMissing: Image data missing for AI SEO (index: {index})
ImageSeoGenerationPage.HowItWorksStep1Desc: Select or drag & drop images. Our AI prepares them for SEO analysis.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.HowItWorksStep2Desc: Our AI analyzes each image to understand its content, context, and SEO potential.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.HowItWorksStep3Desc: AI crafts SEO-friendly filenames and descriptive alt text. Keywords enhance optimization.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.HowItWorksStep4Desc: Copy the AI-generated SEO content to improve your website, blog, or social media's search ranking and accessibility.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.NoResultsYet: Upload images to see AI-generated SEO content.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.KeywordsSectionDescription: Add comma-separated keywords. Our AI will strategically incorporate them into image alt text for better SEO.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.KeywordsPlaceholder: e.g., travel, food, e-commerce, product category
ImageSeoGenerationPage.RegeneratingStatus: AI regenerating alt text with new SEO keywords...
ImageSeoGenerationPage.PreparingDownload: Preparing AI SEO files for download...
ImageSeoGenerationPage.NoFilesToDownload: No AI-processed images with SEO data to download.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.ErrorCreatingZIP: Error creating AI SEO ZIP. Please try again.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.FreeLimitReachedDialogTitle: Upgrade for More AI SEO Power
ImageSeoGenerationPage.FreeLimitReachedDialogMessage: You've reached the free limit for AI SEO. Upgrade to Pro to process more images.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.FreeLimitReachedSomeProcessed: Free plan limit of {count} images reached for AI SEO. Processing the first {count}. Upgrade for more.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.ProLimitReachedSomeProcessed: Pro plan limit of {count} images reached for AI SEO. Processing the first {count}.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.NoValidFilesToProcessAfterLimit: No images to process for AI SEO after plan limits.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.ProUserCardDescription: You're on the Pro plan! Enjoy unlimited AI SEO image generation per batch and all premium features.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.UpgradeToProCardDescription: Unlock full AI SEO power! Free users can process {maxImagesFree} images. Pro users enjoy unlimited image processing & more benefits.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.ProUserPlanIndicator: Pro Plan: Unlimited AI SEO image generation.
ImageSeoGenerationPage.FreeUserPlanIndicator: Free Plan: AI SEO for up to 3 images. Upgrade for unlimited!
